LanguageData.VME_Fire_Desired.label: desired
LanguageData.VME_Fire_Desired.description:
The warmth of ash, the light of embers, scintillating flame is an awesome sight to behold.

<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color>
 - Colonists get moods bonuses depending on the number of active fires on the map. Campfires, torches, Stone Campfires from Vanilla Furniture Expanded - Core and Hearths from Vanilla Factions Expanded - Vikings also count.
LanguageData.VME_Fire_Despised.label: despised
LanguageData.VME_Fire_Despised.description:
There is nothing as disgusting as an out of control fire. The flames shall be avoided by any means necessary, for their destructive power is unmatched.

<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color>
 - Colonists get negative moods depending on the number of active fires on the map. Campfires, torches, Stone Campfires from Vanilla Furniture Expanded - Core and Hearths from Vanilla Factions Expanded - Vikings also count.
